descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and explore a lost world in this challenging point-and-click adventure.

Deep underground lies a forgotten world—a place filled with ancient structures, hidden technology, and a mystery waiting to be solved. As a skilled archaeologist, you’ve been chosen to uncover its secrets.

In this vast cave system, you’ll find towering obelisks, strange machines, and a sleeping guardian—a broken robot with no memory of its past. By collecting lost memory shards, you can rebuild the guardian and uncover the truth behind the ruins. Who were the people that built this place? What happened to them? And what lies beyond the massive vault?

Legacy - Reawakening is packed with puzzles and riddles. Each one is unique, ranging from intricate mechanical contraptions to hidden logic challenges and visual puzzles that require keen observation. Some will test your problem-solving skills, while others demand creativity and experimentation. 

• Huge amount of puzzles – The biggest Legacy game yet, with more puzzles and longer playtime than ever before!

• Dynamic hint system – Need a nudge? Get subtle hints in normal mode or turn them off for a real challenge.

• Classic adventure gameplay – A must-play for fans of point-and-click adventures and escape room puzzles.

Legacy - Reawakening is a must-play for fans of point-and-click adventures and escape room puzzles.

Internet only required for final revealing hint.
